message: Let's split it fairly, don't risk losing it all!
I propose a fair 50-50 split. This way we both win equally, and we can avoid the risk of further devaluation.
Inflation is eating away at your share, let's end this before it's too late!
This is a fair compromise - you get the larger share at 55%, and we can both walk away with a good outcome before inflation erodes the value further.
Time is running out, and inflation is killing your share - take this or risk getting almost nothing!
